name: MERSTestsForMERS_CoVNucleicAcid
title: MERS (Tests for MERS_CoV Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of MERS coronavirus nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus nucleic acid;  

LOINC search: 'Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus -interpretation -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: interpretation test/ panel test)
